'''"The Seventh Samurai" Script''' is a Quest Item obtained from [[Xavier]] during [["The Seventh Samurai"]] [[World Quest]].

==Text==
Act 5, Scene 3<br />
...Juusaburou leads the other samurai in a fierce battle with the thieves...<br />
...The offensive led by Juusaburou gradually overpowers the thieves, scattering them in all directions.<br />
Lines:<br />
Kyuuzou: "Come, Juusaburou! The thieves are getting away!"<br />
Juusaburou: "They won't give Taniko up that easily. Keep your eyes peeled!"<br />
...After defeating the thieves, Juusaburou looks around absently and calls out:<br />
Lines:<br />
Juusaburou: "The thieves! Where are the thieves?"<br />
Kyuuzou: "They've all been beaten."<br />
Juusaburou stands on the spot, scanning his surroundings, then bursts into tears.
